comments:
I20050426-1700

The NPE is caused by 

org.eclipse.ui.internal.UILockListener.doPendingWork

Moving to Platform/UI.
Adding John. I think he's familiar with this code.
Adding Tod because I enjoy trapping him under mountains of bugs.

It's not possible for an NPE to occur in doPendingWork.  All object references
are either to final fields, or to local variables that have been checked for
null before referencing them. Since the stack trace is showing (Inlined Compiled
Code) with no line numbers, I think it's possibly occurring inside the runnable
being executed.  Stefan, let me know if you are able to reproduce.

Unless this can be reproduced, I am going to close.  The NPE is coming from the
runnable being executed from doPendingWork, but it looks like this is somehow
being JITed and the line information is lost from the trace. Without that info
we can't figure out who was causing the NPE.
